headline: Local artist strives for Ohio Senate to pass Parkinson’s bill
author: Jonathan Renforth
sentences: That legislation would create a patient registry to better treat people with diseases like Parkinson’s.
(WKBN)- A local artist is taking his fight against Parkinson’s to the Ohio Senate.
He wants them to know how important it is to pass a bill.
Ron Moore will speak before the Health Committee.
Senator Michael Rulli is the main sponsor.
